title: A Residential Permaculture Design in under 30 seconds

tasks.task: Drive a tractor through a field.
subtasks: Sit on the tractor seat.
Steer the tractor with the steering wheel to navigate through the field.
Operate the pedals to control speed and direction.

tasks.task: Attach a plow to the tractor.
subtasks: Approach the plow hitch on the tractor.
Align the plow coulter with the hitch pins.
Lift the plow and attach it securely to the tractor.

tasks.task: Operate the plow to turn the soil.
subtasks: Lower the plow into the ground.
Move the tractor forward to engage the plow's cutting edges.
Maintain a straight path to properly turn the soil.

tasks.task: Load the plowed soil onto a cart.
subtasks: Approach the cart positioned adjacent to the plowed area.
Maneuver the cart into position to collect the turned soil.
Use a pitchfork or shovel to transfer the soil from the plow to the cart.

tasks.task: Transport the cart to a designated area.
subtasks: steer the tractor while pulling the cart to the landing spot.
Adjust speed and direction carefully to avoid jolts.
Position the cart over the destination spot.
Release the soil by tilting the cart or using a chute.

tasks.task: Use a harrow to smooth the soil.
subtasks: Attach the harrow to the tractor.
Lower the harrow prongs into the soil.
Drive the tractor over the field, allowing the harrow to smooth the surface.
Position the cultivator implements at the correct depth.
Operate the tractor to move the cultivator through the rows, breaking up soil clumps.
Check the implement's progress and adjust settings as needed.

tasks.task: Harvest a portion of the crop using a picker.
subtasks: Drive the picker through the row, cradling the crop stalks.
Ensure proper height and angle for efficient harvesting.
Operate the picker's onboard mechanism to collect the harvested material.

tasks.task: Load bundles or cut stalks onto a truck.
subtasks: Arrange the bundles or stacked stalks onto the truck bed.
Secure the load with straps or lashings to prevent shifting.

tasks.task: Operate a bindler to tie the bundles.
subtasks: Feed the harvested stalks into the bindler.
Adjust the bindler settings for optimal bundling.
Transfer the tied bundles to storage or transport.
